results.summary: This initiative aims to unify cancellation funnels across all HelloFresh Group brands by replicating the proven HelloFresh cancellation flow UX to other brands including meal-kit, RTE, The PetsTable, GoodChop, and Factor. The project will standardize the cancellation experience, implement consistent surveys, and unify deflection strategies to improve customer retention and streamline operational maintenance.

must_have: Replicate HelloFresh cancellation funnel UX to all remaining brands (meal-kit, RTE, The PetsTable, GoodChop, Factor Form)
Create new cancellation funnel module (not reusing HelloFresh funnel code)
Handle all existing funnel variations (BAU flow, one-step funnel, one-click funnel, French adjusted funnel) in scalable way
Standardize cancellation surveys across brands using HelloFresh framework
Implement special deflections: Benefits of keeping subscription (discounts, credits, loyalty status)
Implement regular deflection modules: Offer new discount, Change plan frequency, Change plan size, Skip instead of cancel
Ensure market level compliance with local regulations
Handle RTE subscription cancellation orchestration when meal kit subscription is cancelled
nice_to_have: A/B test for all brands excluding HelloFresh (control = BAU, variation = unified funnel)
Alternative: A/B test targeting Factor US customers only
out_of_scope: Switch to other brand deflection (removed from initiative scope, keep live for HelloFresh only)
Green Chef brand (not included in current scope)
Enabling stakeholders to modify surveys/deflections (only technical team can modify)

decisions.what: Rollout scenario selection (A/B test vs pre-post analysis)
decisions.rationale: Decision depends on engineering complexity and effort estimation

decisions.what: Change plan size deflection to redirect directly to subscription settings
decisions.rationale: No price information shown and has one of the lowest deflection rates

decisions.what: Move 'Offer new discount' from special deflection to regular module
Remove 'Switch to other brand' from initiative scope
decisions.rationale: Keep it live only for HelloFresh brand

technical: Migration of existing funnels to new app
Account settings pages (different links per brand: HF /account-settings/subscription-settings, Factor /settings/plan/plan-selection)
Orchestration layer for RTE subscription cancellation
team: Voice of Customer team (primary users of cancellation survey results)
Analytics team (cancellation metrics and GA events alignment)
Local market teams (compliance and local requirements)
Juan Sebastian Hernandez (Voice of Customer contact)

success_metrics: Customer retention improvement for Factor and other brands
Consistent customer feedback collection across brands

entities.name: HelloFresh
entities.role: Source brand for cancellation funnel UX

entities.name: Tableau
entities.role: Source of truth for cancellation metrics
